entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
